DOCNAME: CASE OF GONCHAROV AND OTHERS v. UKRAINE
CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6;Violation of P1-1;Remainder inadmissible;Pecuniary and non-pecuniary damage - financial awards (global)
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants were born in DATE , DATE , DATE and DATE respectively and live in PERSON , the GPE region .
CARDINAL . The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

CARDINAL . On various dates the applicants instituted civil proceedings in ORG ( Краснолуцький міський суд PERSON області ) seeking salary arrears and various payments from ORG “ GPE ” ( “ the ORG , ” ДВАТ шахта “ ORG ” TIME “ Донбасантрацит ” ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG awarded UAH CARDINAL in favour of the first applicant .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG awarded UAH CARDINAL in favour of the second applicant .
CARDINAL . On DATE and DATE ORG awarded ORG ORG and ORG CARDINAL respectively in favour of the third applicant .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG awarded ORG CARDINAL in favour of the fourth applicant .

CARDINAL . The judgments in favour of the applicants became final and the enforcement writs were transferred to ORG ( “ the Bailiffs , ” PERSON виконавчої служби ORG міського управління юстиції ) for enforcement .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( “ ORG , ” Господарський суд PERSON області ) initiated bankruptcy proceedings against the Company and introduced a moratorium on payment of its debts .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG approved a friendly settlement between the ORG and its creditors and discontinued the bankruptcy proceedings .

CARDINAL . The first , the second and the fourth applicant received their judgments debts in several instalments , the final payments being made in DATE . The third applicant received the debt due to her by the judgment of DATE in DATE and in DATE DATE - the debt by the judgment of DATE .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgment of ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § CARDINAL , DATE ) .
